document.full_text: some iraqi soldiers are worried about the u.s. troops' withdrawal from iraq at the end of the year and say the country's security forces need more training to use the modern tanks and jets it has bought.
document.title: iraqi soldiers say need u.s. beyond 2011 for training
lines_and_colors: some iraqi soldiers are worried about the u.s. troops' withdrawal from iraq at the end of the year and say the country's security forces need more training to use the modern tanks and jets it has bought.
